name: CatholicDaily
0:
”Alexa, ask Catholic Daily for the readings for today”
”Alexa, ask Catholic Daily for the gospel for today”
”Alexa, tell Catholic Daily I want the readings for July 26, 2016”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: catholic daily
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Update: We listen to our users! In response to feedback, Alexa now reads at a slower pace. 

Whether you didn't make it to Mass this week, or you just want time for some spiritual reflection, Catholic Daily provides a piece of the Mass to you from the convenience of your Alexa-enabled device. Hear all of a day's readings or just the gospel direct from the Roman Catholic Lectionary for Mass. Catholic Daily works every day, from Sundays to weekdays. It can deliver the readings to you faithfully in every liturgical season, from Advent to ordinary time. Listen to readings from today or a date of your choosing. 

We are committed to providing a positive user experience. Our database is manually curated and it will take some time for the entire lectionary to be completed. If the skill does not return a reading for a particular day, please notify us at the email at the bottom of our the Privacy Policy and we'll address it right away. Got a feature request? Contact us or let us know by leaving us a review.
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
